Text: Why in the world would you have music in .m4a? There is seriously no reason at all, why you should use this format instead of .mp3. But thank you for uploading. I'll just convert it myself, and start being grateful. :0p
@Faergens because this is "The Obadiah Parker Live album downloaded from iTunes and stripped of DRM with QTFairUse". iTunes downloads = .m4a
Thanks a lot, but could you please upload it again in higher quality than 128 kBit/s?

ditto SyrinXeno -- this is much appreciated, but a higher bitrate would be...more appreciated
thanks
